choices.B: Port2 needs to wait 500 milliseconds to change the status from alive to dead.
choices.C: The SLA state of port2 has exceeded three consecutive unanswered requests from the SLA server.
choices.D: Check interval is the time to wait before a packet sent by a member interface considered as lost.
choices.A: The dead member interface stays unavailable until an administrator manually brings the interface back.

questions.question_text: What is the lnkmtd process responsible for?

choices.B: Monitoring links for any bandwidth saturation

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Used bandwidth is measured by the link monitoring process lnkmtd. You can view measured bandwidth by running the diagnose sys link-monitor interface command.

Answer B

D

questions.question_text: Which statement defines how a per-IP traffic shaper of 10 Mbps is applied to the entire network?

choices.D: A single user uses the allocated bandwidth divided by total number of users.
choices.C: FortiGate allocates each IP address a maximum 10 Mbps of bandwidth.
choices.B: Each IP is guaranteed a minimum 10 Mbps of bandwidth.
choices.A: The 10 Mbps bandwidth is shared equally among the IP addresses.

discussion.content: I think the correct answer is B

Selected Answer: B
B refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 226

questions.question_text: Which statement reflects how BGP tags work with SD-WAN rules?

choices.B: Route tags are used for a BGP community and the SD-WAN rules are assigned the same tag.
choices.A: VPN topologies are formed using only BGP dynamic routing with SD-WAN.
choices.C: BGP tags require that the adding of static routes be enabled on all ADVPN interfaces.
choices.D: BGP tags match the SD-WAN rule based on the order that these rules were installed.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
refer to SD-WAN_6.4_Study_Guide page 226

Selected Answer: C
page 226 Study Guide

choices.A: Adding static routes must be enabled on all ADVPN interfaces.
choices.D: Dynamic routing protocols can be used only with non-encrypted traffic.
choices.B: VPN topologies must be form using only BGP dynamic routing with SD-WAN.
choices.C: Learned routes can be used as dynamic destinations in SD-WAN rules.
